mapper.sql: id, phone, userName, passWord, regType, regDate, headImage, areaId, sex, birthDay, realName, schoolId
mapper.insert: insert into stu_teacher_info (phone, userName, passWord, regType, regDate, headImage, areaId, sex, birthDay, realName, schoolId) values (#{phone}, #{userName}, #{passWord}, #{regType}, now(), #{headImage}, #{areaId}, #{sex}, #{birthDay}, #{realName}, #{schoolId})
